name: UTRIED
description:
>>Jobs
You can get something, but it does not go very far. The important thing is how you manage your money. Everyone knows that work is just a stepping stone to something bigger. But you do not have much time. Online jobs include: Programmer, Modeler, Writer, Design and Others
You can choose to hack computers to steal money . This is not honest work. but if you need so much money.
>>Invest
You can invest your money, this can be profitable when done properly. Some digital coins are available, choose the most lucrative. An artificial intelligence simulates the buying and selling of investors and mining, creating the graphical behavior. each one has its volatility being possible to operate using market strategies, example support and resistance, pullback among others.
Also create your own digital currency. When done, it will be part of the investment market in which you can trade.
>>Mining
Mining digital coins, the most lucrative and coveted. You can rent some places to put your machines. You can exchange the digital coins for money whenever you want, the price will be paid according to the fluctuating market price. sometimes it is better to wait a little before negotiating.

>>Features

  • Be a gamedev, create your game from start to launch in Store. or hire a team and manage.
  • Make bank loans, with up to 60% of your income. pay on time or the amount would accrue daily interest.
  • freelancer; solve and learn basic concepts of programming language, modeling and design and receive money for it.
  • Manage your own miners' room, or hire someone to do maintenance and payments for expenses.
  • Take a business trip, and pay for airfare or buy a private jet.
  • Invade computers to make money. You also run those risks. Malicious hackers will want your money too.
  • Dispute first place on the leaderboard as the best investor.
